title: Location Context
description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, working hours.

localTime.title: Local Time
localTime.description: The local time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

geo.title: Geo
geo.description: The geographic location where the experience was delivered .
